Comment_12_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you for coming to see me.<sp:0:4:0>How goes your quest to locate Mineru?<sp:5:0:0>
The fifth sage?<sp:5:1:0> If there is any way I can be
of assistance, do not hesitate to ask!
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Oh! Or perhaps you are here due to your
intolerable curiosity about the text I
mentioned regarding a <clr:0000>secret treasure<clr:ffff>?
Comment_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>You never disappoint, do you? Yes,
this is just what I expected of my
dearest companion!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive_01>In that case, I shall let you in on the
mystery. There was a passage in the text
I mentioned that went as follows...
<snd:Think_00>"The great fish. The eternal guardian.<sp:5:0:0>
A secret treasure awaits just beneath
the stony form of its statue.
"Below the long bridge that reaches for
the statue, leave your fears behind. <sp:5:0:0>Pass
beneath two waterfalls to find your prize."
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>So! What do you make of it? It is like a
good, old-fashioned treasure hunt,
is it not?
That said, it was a very old book, so it is
questionable whether that <clr:0000>secret treasure<clr:ffff>
is still there, or ever was.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>However, if there is truth in those ancient
words, this treasure may be of use to you.<sp:5:1:0>
If you see fit, I encourage you to seek it!
Comment_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>I see...<sp:5:0:0> Well, I am sure you have your
reasons! If you ever feel so inclined,
I would be happy to share my findings.
Comment_06_00: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>What's this?<sp:5:1:0> You have already found it?!
Comment_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>"The great fish. The eternal guardian.<sp:5:0:0>
A secret treasure awaits just beneath
the stony form of its statue.
"Below the long bridge that reaches for
the statue, leave your fears behind. <sp:5:0:0>Pass
beneath two waterfalls to find your prize."
<snd:Chat_01>Ah, the mystery of it all! <sp:5:1:0>The first step,
I would dare to venture, <sp:5:0:0>is to determine
what "the great fish" is referring to.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>If there is truth in those ancient words,
this <clr:0000>secret treasure<clr:ffff> may be of use to you.
If you see fit, I encourage you to seek it!

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>If that is not what brought you here, are
you, by chance, intrigued by the text I
found regarding a <clr:0000>secret treasure<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>It is about nothing short of a <clr:0000>secret

you, I take it you are intrigued?
Comment_15:

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>It seems to hint at a secret treasure,

Comment_13_00:

Comment_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Link! Your timing is as impeccable
as ever, my friend!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I have not discovered any new hints about
your princess, I fear. However... I have
stumbled across something fascinating.
As I was diligently organizing texts
relating to the royal family, I came
across one of particular interest.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>The content regarded a secret treasure,
and at once I thought of you. This seems
just your sort of thing! So? Intrigued?
